name: piny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to pine trees or pine wood, especially to the smell of this wood: The piny smell made him think of a hospital. I sat on the piny ground under one of the trees. See
pine
More examplesFewer examplesThe air filled with a rich, piney aroma.The plants look better than a fence and they give off a nice piny smell as well.In the piney woods just outside this East Texas town lies the grave of a homeless man.
